GSD.description:
NFSD: prevent integer overflow on 32 bit systems

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit 3a2789e8ccb4a3e2a631f6817a2d3bb98b8c4fd8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: NFSD: prevent integer overflow on 32 bit systems
